text: Richard Napier Luce, Baron Luce, (born 14 October 1936), is a British politician. He was Lord Chamberlain to the Queen from 2000 to 2006. He was a Conservative Member of Parliament (MP) from 1971 to 1992. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:Politicians from London Category:Governors of Gibraltar
title: Richard Luce, Baron Luce
